home.aboutText:
Junior Research Engineer based in Paris, France.

I am a Data Scientist and Generative AI developer. I create digital tools across web, UX/UI, and explore visual storytelling through photography and video, often after a gravel ride
home.toolsSubtitle: Explore my collection of utility tools and applications.
home.footerBuilt: Built with <3 in Vue.js & Tailwind CSS

toolbox.title: TOOLS COLLECTION
toolbox.subtitle: A curated set of small, purposeful tools

pdf.title: PDF TOOLS
pdf.desc: Compress, split, and extract PDF pages. Fast and local.

tictactoe.title: TIC TAC TOE
tictactoe.desc: A minimal Tic Tac Toe to unwind on the go. Play against a friend or the computer.

flipcoin.title: FLIP COIN
flipcoin.desc: A playful 3D coin to help you decide. Heads or tails?

rag.title: RAG CHATBOT
rag.desc: Ask your documents questions with vector search and an LLM‑powered assistant.

toolbox.comingSoonText: More tools are in the works. Check back soon.

gallery.title: GALLERY
gallery.subtitle: A curated selection of my photography. High-res images served via CDN. If you wish to use any photo, please contact me first.
gallery.noPhotos: No photos yet. Populate public/gallery/index.json with image entries.
